Key Match Events: Zack Littell shut down Cleveland with six strong innings
Jhonkensy Noel and David Fry hit back-to-back doubles in the eighth inning
Pre-Game Insights: Cleveland was without Steven Kwan due to body fatigue
Tampa Bay manager Kevin Cash brought in Edwin Uceta after a suspension
Post-Match Reflections: Cleveland's loss reduced their division lead to three games
Logan Driscoll's first career home run drew a warm celebration from the Rays
Miscellaneous Highlights: Christopher Morel was replaced due to right Achilles tendon discomfort
Ben Lively threw a bullpen session after a thigh bruise
Others: Rays' Logan Driscoll made his MLB debut on September 3
Tampa Bay's starter Zack Littell is 4-0 against Cleveland
